<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Energy Ward](/Feats.aspx?ID=1822) <actions string="Free Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Sorcerer" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=148" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 140 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Frequency**
once per turn

**Requirements**
Your most recent action was to cast a non-cantrip spell that dealt energy damage.

</column>

---

You trap energy from the last spell you cast within your body, coating your flesh in a protective ward. Until the start of your next turn, you gain resistance 5 to one type of energy damage dealt by the spell you just cast.
name: Energy Ward
